field.name: widget state
field.definition: this section is split up into YES and NO flags. a widget will draw if any of it's YES flags are true, but it will NOT draw if any of it's NO flags are true.

field.name: WIDGET EFFECTS
field.definition: allow the scaling, rotation, and offsetting of widgets

field.name: widget state
field.definition: this section is split up into YES and NO flags. a widget will draw if any of it's YES flags are true, but it will NOT draw if any of it's NO flags are true.

field.name: FLAGS
field.definition:
string is a number: treats the inputted string id as a function name, not a string name
force 2-digit number: when used in combination with above, forces output to be a 2-digit numberwith leading zeros if necessary
force 3-digit number: same as above, but with 3 digits instead of 2

field.name: WIDGET EFFECTS
field.definition: allow the scaling, rotation, and offsetting of widgets

field.name: dashlight data
field.definition: only relevant to new hud tags for weapons

field.name: low clip cutoff
field.help: the cutoff for showing the reload dashlight

field.name: low ammo cutoff
field.help: the cutoff for showing the low ammo dashlight

field.name: age cutoff
field.help: the age cutoff for showing the low battery dashlight

field.name: widget state
field.definition: this section is split up into YES and NO flags. a widget will draw if any of it's YES flags are true, but it will NOT draw if any of it's NO flags are true.
